txt.en: 'You have done it! This chest contains treasures of past ages forged to fight the forces of darkness!\n\n'After all of your effort and the danger you have seen, it is only right that you choose one of these items as your just reward. The rest will be sent to my brethren to distribute.'
'Have you not recovered the treasure of the Seven Sentinels?'
The Seven Swords
You place the sword in the statue's hand
This does not seem to be the right statue
You place the sword in the statue's hand

The statues of the Seven Sentinels are in the Fane of the Seven Sentinels, east of Gabilshathûr.\n\nThe seven swords must be given to the Seven Sentinels in the correct order before the vault will open.

You have solved the puzzle of the seven sentinels, so now it is time to enter the vault and retrieve the treasure.
Give the Sword of Arvedui to the correct statue

Bring the treasure of the Seven Sentinels back to Nethraw
Collect the treasure of the Seven Sentinels
This does not seem to be the right statue
\nYou place the sword in the statue's hand
This does not seem to be the right statue
All seven swords of the Seven Sentinels have been recovered, and Nethraw makes final preparations to unlock the vault of the Seven Sentinels.
You place the sword in the statue's hand
This does not seem to be the right statue
Collected the treasure of the Seven Sentinels

'At last, the time has come to open the ancient vault! I believe each of these seven statues must be given the correct sword before the vault can be opened...but the tale is unfortunately a bit vague. I suppose we could try all the combinations, but that might take a long time. \n\n'I have made a copy of the relevant verses -- here, perhaps you can puzzle it all out.'
